title: Sequoia & Kings Canyon National Parks: Press Kit
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Press Kit              Press Kit       Fact Sheet (2016)  Use our Fact Sheet to quickly learn basic information about Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks.  Park Newspaper  The park newspaper, the Visitor Guide, provides key information about how to plan a trip to the most-visited areas of Sequoia and Kings Canyon National Parks.
